name: Barcode Buddy for Grocy
author: Forceu
description: Pass barcodes to Barcode Buddy. If already in the Grocys system, it will consume/add/open the product there. If an unknown barcode is passed, the product name will be looked up and a corresponding product can be chosen in the Web UI. Tags can be saved â€” if a new product contains the tag in the name, the product will be already preselected in the drop-down list.
